home.title: Home
home.description: Main page of the Reservation System website
home.subtitle: What is the Reservation System?
home.subdescription:
With the Reservation System,
you can reserve space and check who is using it.
Login is optional.

login.title: Login
login.description: Sign in with magic link or Google account
login.magicLinkSent: Login link sent to your email. Please check your email.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: View and edit your user profile information

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage app settings including language and theme

ships.confirmDeleteRejectedRequest: Are you sure you want to delete this rejected application? The user will be able to apply again.
